For those who don't know how to install:

Needed programs: WinRAR, Power ISO (or other mounting software)

1. In the downloaded folder right click on one of the sr-hoi3 files and click Extract here

2. Open the mounting software and mount the .bin file

3. Go to My Computer (or Computer) and run Autoplay

4. Install the game and play! :D

Big thanks to Groo_The_Wanderer for this!
